message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NI, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on the design and implementation of an intrusion detection mechanism for Distributed Denial of Service (DDOS) attacks. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also likely as the paper discusses the use of machine learning methods, specifically Fuzzy Rule Interpolation, in the intrusion detection system. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper compares the performance of Fuzzy Rule Interpolation with other common classification algorithms for detecting DDOS attacks. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is a possible category as the paper deals with detecting attacks on network systems. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is also a possible category as the paper discusses the design and implementation of a control system for detecting and preventing DDOS attacks.
